parametrized_description: A popup clinic administers two types of virus tests: spit tests and swab tests. Administering a spit test takes TimeSpitTest minutes and administering a swab test takes TimeSwabTest minutes. At least MinRatioSpitToSwab times as many spit tests as swab tests must be administered, and at least MinSwabTests swab tests must be administered. The clinic operates for TotalOperatingTime minutes. The objective is to maximize the total number of tests administered.

TimeSpitTest.description: Time to administer a spit test

TimeSwabTest.description: Time to administer a swab test

MinRatioSpitToSwab.description: Minimum ratio of spit tests to swab tests

MinSwabTests.description: Minimum number of swab tests to administer

NumberOfSpitTests.description: The number of spit tests to administer

NumberOfSwabTests.description: The number of swab tests to administer

constraints.description: Administering a spit test takes TimeSpitTest minutes and administering a swab test takes TimeSwabTest minutes. The total operating time cannot exceed TotalOperatingTime minutes.
At least MinRatioSpitToSwab times as many spit tests as swab tests must be administered.
At least MinSwabTests swab tests must be administered.

objective.description: The total number of tests administered is the sum of spit tests and swab tests. The objective is to maximize the total number of tests administered.
